metadata.name: Interesting Service Enumeration Via Sc.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the enumeration and query of interesting and in some cases sensitive services on the system via "sc.exe". Attackers often try to enumerate the services currently running on a system in order to find different attack vectors.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sc.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('sc.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('query')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('termservice')))

output.summary: Detects the enumeration and query of interesting and in some cases sensitive services on the system via "sc.exe". Attackers often try to enumerate the services currently running on a system in order to find different attack vectors.
